title: DIRE WOLVES CHRISTMAS GIVEAWAY
body:
http://i.imgur.com/QIvCmpl.jpg

***

Thanks to our amazing sponsor ROCCAT, here is what's up for grabs:

2 x ROCCAT Kova
2 x ROCCAT Kiro
2 x ROCCAT Taito Control
2 x ROCCAT Aluma
2 x Dire Wolves T-shirt

The first 50 people to enter will also go in the draw to win a ROCCAT Ryos MK Glow keyboard.
Good luck to everyone and happy holidays and new year.

***

Terms and Conditions:

* One entry per Facebook user
* Competition is only available to Australia/New Zealand residents
* Entries close 03.01.2016 6PM AEDT
* Winners announced 06.01.2016 on Dire Wolves Facebook page

***
